topics_and_summary.models.summarization module¶

class topics_and_summary.models.summarization.SummarizationModel[source]¶

Bases: object

Interface that represents a summarization model.

get_k_best_sentences_of_text(text: str, num_best_sentences=5) → List[str][source]¶

Get the k best sentences of the given text.

Parameters

  • text – Text where summary sentences will be obtained.

  • num_best_sentences – Number of summary sentences to be returned.

Returns

List[str] where each str is a sentence.

class topics_and_summary.models.summarization.TextRank(embedding_model='glove', glove_embedding_dim=100)[source]¶

Bases: topics_and_summary.models.summarization.SummarizationModel

Summarization class using the TextRank algorithm

get_k_best_sentences_of_text(text: str, num_best_sentences=5) → List[str][source]¶

Get the k best sentences of the given text. This method performs an Extractive Summary of the given text.

Parameters

  • text – Text where sentences will be extracted.

  • num_best_sentences – Number of sentences of the text to be returned.

Returns

List[str] where each str is a sentence. The list is in descending order by the importance of the sentences. It can raise a PowerIterationFailedConvergence exception if the algorithm doesn’t converge.
